input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "JAXXON"
Reference Product Name: "14k Gold Cuban Link Chain - 8mm"
Reference Product Description:
Introducing our gold 8mm Stainless Steel Cuban Link Chain â€“ a statement of timeless elegance and enduring strength. Crafted with precision and exceptional resiliency, this chain is designed to withstand tarnishing, corrosion, and daily wear. Elevate your style with its bold 8mm gauge and classic Cuban link design, making it the perfect choice for both casual and formal occasions.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='King Ice 10mm Miami Cuban Curb Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Silver Chain Set'
  - Name='JAXXON Compass Gold Pendant Chain'
  - Name='CRAFTD Men's Miami Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='Men's CRAFTD London Silver 8MM Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Women's Iced Out Cuban Link'
  - Name='CRAFTD London Cuban Link Bracelet'
  - Name='CRAFTD Men's Silver Cuban & Rope Chain Gift Set'
  - Name='The GLD Shop Iced Mariner Cuban 9mm Size'
  - Name='GLD 14K White Gold Cuban Chain'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: King Ice 10mm Miami Cuban Curb Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a Miami Cuban curb chain like the reference, slightly thicker at 10mm versus 8mm, serving a similar function with a similar design, though potentially slightly different link style (curb vs Cuban) which is closely related.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Silver Chain Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also a Cuban link chain from the same brand but 10mm and silver with iced-out design, similar silhouette and construction but different metal and embellishment.
This is a gold pendant chain with a compass, so different primary focus (pendant) and likely different chain style not specified as Cuban link.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CRAFTD Men's Miami Cuban Link Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A men's Miami Cuban link chain closely matching the reference style and construction, very relevant though brand differs and thickness not specified.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's CRAFTD London Silver 8MM Cuban Link Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar to reference: 8mm Cuban link, only difference is silver color and different brand, otherwise practically the same product type and features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 8mm Women's Iced Out Cuban Link
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and size (8mm) Cuban link chain but iced out and targeted to women, very similar product construction with some style variation.
Bracelet rather than chain necklace, different product category though same Cuban link style, so less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CRAFTD Men's Silver Cuban & Rope Chain Gift Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Includes Cuban chain but is a gift set and includes rope chain too, silver color and variety, so somewhat relevant but different presentation and mixed styles.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The GLD Shop Iced Mariner Cuban 9mm Size
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Iced Mariner Cuban chain at 9mm size is similar in construction and style to Cuban link chains though iced and slightly thicker, somewhat relevant.
Very close product: 14K white gold Cuban chain likely similar thickness and construction but in white gold instead of stainless steel gold coating, same high-end style.
